titles: Their highness the Prince & Princess of Orange's opinion about a general liberty of conscience, &c. being a collection of four select papers.
author: Fagel, Gaspar, 1634-1688.
Stewart, James, Sir, 1635-1713. Correspondence. Selections.
Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Richard Janeway,
notes: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library and Huntington Library.
Papers originally edited or translated by Gilbert Burnet.

I. Mijn Heer Fagel's first letter to Mr. Stewart -- II. Reflexions on Monsieur Fagel's letter -- III. Fagel's second letter to Mr. Stewart -- IV. Some extracts, out of Mr. Stewart's letters, which were communicated to Mijn Heer Fagel, together with some references to Mr. Stewart's printed letter.
keywords: Liberty of conscience --  Early works to 1800.
Freedom of religion --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Church and state --  England --  Early works to 1800.
